overview_of_class:
MUS_TECH 321-0 Producing in the Virtual Studio
The class will explore session and post-production techniques using common audio software. Software covered will include ProTools (plus plug-ins), Sound Forge, Adobe Audition, and various digital signal processing applications. Students realize projects using the software of their choice. The class will also cover accompanying hardware components. Students will complete audio projects of personal interest and pursue them with the goal of producing a professional quality result. Topics include running a hard disk multitrack session, intensive audio editing, effects processing, mastering, and basic surround mixing.
name: Producing in the Virtual Studio
